Reviews.Title: great camera, very easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Edward P. Staniszewski
Reviews.Content: I've owned this nice little camera for about 6 months now.  I am not an avid photography person, just a point and shoot that doesnt get into all the settings and things.  I must say this is the best camera i have owned ever!!  Picture quality and ease of operation are its primary pros.  I also wanted a camera that shot at least 720p video which this camera does pretty good.  The price was right and also came with a 16gb micro sd card.  I also wanted a camera that had a rechargeable li-ion battery instead of using AA's.  The battery life is superb also!!Yes it is small but i like that, the wall charger (very compact) and camera fit very nicely into a generic case which i got on fleabay for like $3.95 shipped!For basic point and shoot camera people you will not go wrong with this camera, i love mine!!

Reviews.Title: Expected Good - Got Great!
Reviews.Author: J. Sheldon Cooper "Conspicuous Consumer"
Reviews.Content: I must have a dozen digital cameras, from Nikon dSLRs costing thousands, and Point and Shoots from Sony, Leica, Nikon and Panasonic.The Lumix line was initially almost identical to Leica. Panasonic made the bodies, and Leitz provided the optics. Although you may not find a red dot on a similar camera, the lens is still provided by Leica. Professional photographers have always revered their Leica lenses as the zenith in optical quality.So to get fine optical quality in a $70 package is almost unheard of. There are several models in the Lumix line, all withj differing sizes and features. The FH6 is a top functioning camera in a small, slim package. Small enough to fit in a shirt pocket without a bulge.Startup is quick. Shutter lag negligible. Operation is intuitive.Along with great pictures, you can shoot crisp 720p video, and get 5x optical zoom.I knew from past experience that the Lumix FH6 would be good, but it has surpassed all expectations. It's hard to believe it costs less than $100. In a Lightning Deal, the price dropped to $69.95. If you buy one, you won't be disappointed. If I'm not shooting I very low light, or requiring 5fps burst speeds and sophisticated metering, the Nikon dSLR stays home and the FH6 slides into my shirt pocket.I am delighted with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Don M. Blews
Reviews.Content: great little camera with every function and adjustments easily accessed. appears rugged and tough enough last for years. plus, its got a super lens for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great beginner digital camera
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: My first digital camera.  Chose it because it was rated easy to use in a consumers magazine and has everything I need.  It's all it claimed to be.  When I grow to a fancier camera with more zoom and features, I'll go with Panasonic again.

Reviews.Title: Mostly good for the price!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: It is a good camera for the price.  It is light weight, takes nice photos etc However, it does not zoom in when recording movies and that is a real down side for me.  Aside from that I am happy enough with it.

Reviews.Title: Simplicity meets Quality (lacks a few features)
Reviews.Author: Taylor Marsh "DESOLATER IV"
Reviews.Content: Without any instructions (there are instructions) and without any experience of using cameras, I taught myself everything there is to know about this camera and love it.Things a normal person should know:14.1 MP PicturesMultiple Settings, Including a setting for Motion PicturesVideo RecordingPanoramasMany other features that improve photos in different settings.5x Zoom + when at 5x no quality is lost. The focus/picture is clear.You can plug your camera directly into your computer via USB to look through your pictures.---------------------------------------------------------------------Negatives: External Wall Battery Charger....  Why can't I just charge the battery through USB without having to constantly take out, and reinsert the battery?Negatives: It doesn't show you how much memory is left on the card until you plug it in. (might be an issue for small card users)Negatives: The strap is very difficult to get on, I couldn't pry it through the whole, and currently lost it.-----------------------------------------------------------------------Positives: Extremely small, lightweight, very clear pictures, and can do anything any expensive camera can do. (I bought mine for $60...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Overall: 4/5 Perfect for me, for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded My Expectations
Reviews.Author: Brandy
Reviews.Content: Clear pictures, easy to use.  Impressed by ability to zoom in  on pictures.Took a picture of the car window while driving in the dark in the rain--thought I was going to get a reflection of the flash--instead got a picture of the rain moving across the window--WOW!

Reviews.Title: Good with certain limitations
Reviews.Author: Joseph Jou
Reviews.Content: In general, it carries the good features of Panasonic Lumix product series. However, the picture resolution of 14.1M is fixed so that a user can NOT adjust it to a different/lower resolution like any other digital camera. It can potentially chew up the SD card and make it difficult to email due to the size of image file. Be aware of it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Khurram khan
Reviews.Content: Wonderful product. really liked by the person whom i gifted it. A great value for money proposition. Highly recommended for future.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix FH6 14.1 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Sandy Carlton
Reviews.Content: I really like the small size of the camera, it fits nicely in my purse.  It takes really sharp pictures, and the feature where you can lighten up dark pictures is a nice feature.  I am very pleased with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great for a point & shoot.
Reviews.Author: MJO "MJO"
Reviews.Content: Though a point & shoot, you do have some control of the features; and SCENE modes for specific environments.  I bought it because I anted a very small camera that easily fit in my pocket.

Reviews.Title: camera panasonic excellent
Reviews.Author: diobel
Reviews.Content: Camera is a very good quality and with a clear imageexcellent recommendedexcellente product and at great costoptimal effects excellent camera, very complete

Reviews.Title: Not bad for me
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Easy to carry, enough battery for 300 photos, different scenes can be chosen,at least it is not bad for me

Reviews.Title: Just keeps getting better
Reviews.Author: Thankyouverymuch
Reviews.Content: This is my third Lumix. No, not because the other cameras broke, because as soon as I get one for someone, somebody else asks for one as a birthday, or christmas gift. Each generation improves on what the previous generation did well.

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Mdrahota
Reviews.Content: It is a decent camera, taking great photos. It just feels a little cheap but does the job well for price.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Kathryn
Reviews.Content: This camera meet all of my expectation. Before buying it been doing lots or reaserch and mostly say its ok not that good but what can do wrong with LumixSo give it a try and really love it, the size the quality of the picture are all goodOf course cannot compare with Big camera but for pocket camera it is very gooh one

Reviews.Title: Very fast point & shoot
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: We have kids and the previous camera that we had always had blury pictures due to the shutter lag.  I know this is an issue with all point & shoot cameras, but I can't bring myself to spend the $ on an SLR. When the flash isn't needed this camera feels almost instant with no shutter lag. Plus it has good image stabilization. When the flash is needed the speed is slower and the image quality could be improved. Overall this was a great value for the $.

Reviews.Title: ***Trust my opinion, I am a professional librarian!
Reviews.Author: J. C Lee
Reviews.Content: Camera Buyers:I researched all of the point and shoot cameras and I found that the Panasonic Lumix FH6 is the best overall camera for the price and features.  I read that picture quality goes downhill with more magnification so a 5X optical zoom is more than adequate.Let's face it, Panasonic has the best auto focus point-and-shoot cameras in the world.  This cameria is highly rated in the new edition of Consumer Reports Magazine which covers the best products available in 2012.Sure, this camera doesn't have all the bells and whistles but it does take 280 photos on a single battery charge.Ok, this camera is made in China but it still is very durable and inexpensive.All in all, a BEST BUY!!!

Reviews.Title: how many photos can be taken with the built-in memory?
Reviews.Author: Mellie Mendoza
Reviews.Content: I took about 7-8 photos and it says internal memory full. Is that normal? I am yet to purchase an SD card.

Reviews.Title: Nice size, good lens.
Reviews.Author: Katherine Palmer
Reviews.Content: I haven't had it long enough to know whether I'll love it as much as the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ35 that I bought in 2010.  I wanted something much smaller, that would fit in my purse.  I think this camera will work nicely for when I can't carry a bigger camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice little pocker camera for the price...
Reviews.Author: Randall N. Trepagnier
Reviews.Content: Great little pocket camera. It has its drawbacks, but most cameras of this ilk do. Use it all the time for general shooting...

Reviews.Title: Second one for us
Reviews.Author: Duane
Reviews.Content: We had one we destroyed on the beach.  Not a problem to not bother shopping.  Buy a new one !

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: jeff desimone
Reviews.Content: It's a good unit for the money. I like that you can charge the batteries.The only problem is the screen is hard to seed in sunlight

Reviews.Title: Great photos for a great price.
Reviews.Author: 3leggeddogsrule
Reviews.Content: Our first digital camera was a Sony and we were never quite happy with the pictures.  Then again it was only 8 megapixals and things have come a long way since then.  This Panasonic Lumix takes great pictures even in low light.  I took some really good pictures at a concert which is difficult to do.  We use our phones to take lots of our pictures on the fly so we didn't want to spend a lot of money on a camera that we wouldn't use all the time and I am so glad we settled on this one.  It is also very small which makes it convenient to take with you.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera on the market
Reviews.Author: Shawn Stiner
Reviews.Content: This camera offers some very high end applications and is on the higher price of the point and shoot market but when you see the picture quality you will understand why. It is the middle step between entry level point and shoot and a SLR camera...You will love it

Reviews.Title: goog camera
Reviews.Author: jimmy eddy
Reviews.Content: good camera! however failing to charge the battery via USB cable a little uncomfortable! the rest good camera good price

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Alan Lavers
Reviews.Content: It is everything in a digital camera we wanted, compact and very easy to use. Delivery was on time and came as advertised

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: ThisIsIt
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a good camera. The zoom isn't that great for tourist travel and taking pictures from far away.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: J. medawar
Reviews.Content: brilliant colors and easy operation...very impressed!I owned Olympus cameras before but I am a Panasonic fan now!  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Alchymyst "Purging the Dross"
Reviews.Content: If you want ease of use without tons of menus to navigate and good low-light performance, this is hard to beat.  Not a lot of customization options but that is not what this camera is about.  Very compact and lightweight, slip it into your pocket and you're ready to capture memories at a moment's notice.  Great value for the bucks, Leica lens, easy and simple, what's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix FH6 Camera
Reviews.Author: Dr. C. Bradenton "dr. c"
Reviews.Content: Camera seems to be fine. However, arrived with a European charger cord. After contact with Amazon I was advised to buy a US cord, which I did, and was given a substantial adjustment in the cost of the camera. Also, the camera operating instruction booklet could be improved. I am very satisfied in the end

Reviews.Title: lumix camera
Reviews.Author: deliberate
Reviews.Content: The big issue is the slow focus which is way too slow and frustrating for young students on fieldtrips to Tadoussac.

Reviews.Title: Takes Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: Larry Butler
Reviews.Content: I use this camera every day all day taking lots of photos. It takes great shots even in low light situations. I am on my second one, it does not like to be dropped on a hard surface floor. Not many cameras do. The only draw back to this camera is that the LCD is not very bright and it is impossible to see it outside in bright sunlight.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera!
Reviews.Author: mrcharliebrown
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my girlfriend as a gift. She has been really impressed with the photographs this camera can take. Also loves the screen size and how light the camera is!

Reviews.Title: Wider angle lens makes this camera great for close shots
Reviews.Author: bruce
Reviews.Content: I am a Realtor and this camera has a wider angle lens than those usually on the small digital cameras.  I produce excellent pictures inside and out of the homes I am promoting.  Easy to use and great results for an affordable price!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: SLMattie
Reviews.Content: This camera is small and mighty. I bought it to replace a very old Panasonic Lumix DCM FX7 model that I got used many years ago. I never used all the settings so this time I wanted something very simple, that took great pictures and mostly close ups of  home made jewelry. This camera does exactly that. The color is amazing, the IA is fool proof and to say I am very happy with it is an understatement. You can't beat this price either. Highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: leonard
Reviews.Content: panasonic lumix very good camera was a gift for my wife she loved the camera in size is good she can load perfectly in your purse

Reviews.Title: Panasonic camera
Reviews.Author: Howard R. Ashheim
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter. She used the camera when we went to the zoo. She just koved how the picturescame out.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: William Bedon
Reviews.Content: posee una resolucion excelente lo unico que me ubiese encantado que la pantalla fuera tactil y que incluyera mayo capacidad de almacenamiento interno

Reviews.Title: great!!!
Reviews.Author: Ornella Arcia
Reviews.Content: es una gran camara.. buena calidad de imagen y muy compacta... cumplio con todas las espectativas.. excelente vendedor. muy recomendado

Reviews.Title: NICE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: ARCHI
Reviews.Content: The camera is Ok take nice pics, but maybe I understud bad the reference "with 5 Optical Zoom", because to me It only have 2 optical zoom, still is suit my porpose

Reviews.Title: Super camera!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Weiss
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera! Very compact, easy to use, long-lasting rechargeable battery, fast transfer to laptop, and with Transcend 32 GB 10 UHS high speed memory card, I was able to spend nearly 2 weeks out of state over holidays taking lots of excellent videos and pics of young grandsons opening presents and hockey tournaments without ever needing to change cards. SO glad I bought both!! Super fast delivery with regular Amazon free shipping was added bonus.

Reviews.Title: Excelent !
Reviews.Author: Sajorges
Reviews.Content: Very good camera, better than other more expensive that i have. It takes clear pictures, still with zoom and low light. I m satisfied with this camera.

Reviews.Title: The best for your money.
Reviews.Author: Dudoo
Reviews.Content: I really love Panasonic DMC-FH6, it makes my money more value than I ever thought. The pictures that I took have no any distortion and most pictures are great. I gave 5 stars because it is the best small camera without any complains for the money I paid.

Reviews.Title: Came defective out the box !!!!
Reviews.Author: MissMish510 "Always Looking For A Deal :)"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera last week after searching and searching and searching through cameras and ratings. I have had bad luck with cameras through Amazon previously. I've ordered Sony, Olympus, Kodak....etc. The Panasonic I was hoping would be a different story.Not at all. Fresh out the box battery in. Powered on. ..... Line on the left side of my view screen. UGHHH!!!! I ordered this camera last minute with the hope that it would arrive in time for my birthday trip to Reno that starts tomorrow. Delivery was swift, actually arrived Saturday but my grandmother just informed me it was there today. I was so excited and now I am so bummed. I could still use it but a brand new camera should come to you fully functional with zero defects or issues. Not to mention I now have to pay for shipping to return it and get a replacement which was NO FAULT OF MY OWN!!!I think Amazon has me on the defect list because theres no way I could really have such bad luck with these cameras straight out the box....I took one picture to submit with my request for return although I will not be able to return it until after my vacation. Its my birthday and I can not believe this.!!!!!!! I am SO disappointed. I will NEVER purchase another camera through Amazon again.So this camera gets 1 star because it came defective. It looks great tho and I'm sure it would be a great little camera if it had come in perfect working condition as I expected. This camera is not suppose to be refurbished it is suppose to brand new. I am VERY dissatisfied.!! Thanks a lot.Save yourself some trouble and go into the store to purchase.....makes returns much easier as well. So again I will be using my camera phone. I AM VERY UNHAPPY!!!!! So heres to another 3 weeks without a camera.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money...
Reviews.Author: Lyndy Schaefer
Reviews.Content: I guess you get what you pay for. This is a cheaply made camera  (China of course).  It came with a charging plug that cannot be used in the US!!. When I tried my Euopean plugs as an attachment, they wouldn't even fit.  I tried to charge it with the USB port connected to my computer and it used up all the charge in camera!!! I was so frustrated that I sent it right back.  It is a flimsy camera at best. I would not trust it to work for very long. Very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera wrong plugs
Reviews.Author: Chris Sentell
Reviews.Content: I liked the camera alot but it had European type plugs for the battery charger and living in the USA I had no way to charge the battery without an adapter which I didnt have time to get before my vacation.  The seller promptly refunded my money so I would buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: Good point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This camera does not take the best photos I have seen but a good and easy to use point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: lumix-fh6
Reviews.Author: Dennis Kuhn
Reviews.Content: Just a very nice camera. Does what the advertising says it will do. do no know what else to say.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware:  No English Manual
Reviews.Author: Kevin Wood
Reviews.Content: The version of this camera that was sent to my mother (it was a gift) was not packaged for North American distribution and did not contain an English language User's Manual.  Panasonic will not send the correct one.  My mother is not technically savvy, so asking her to download and print two web/PDF documents (totaling 125+ pages) is not an acceptable solution--after all I chose this camera because it was suppose to be simple!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix FH6 14.1 MP
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: Panasonic Lumix FH6 14.1 MPFine camera for the price.I read the reviews on the lens quality and speed and excepted the opinions of specialist photographers.I haven't used the camera yet so I don't have any personal opinion

Reviews.Title: Cannot see LCD screen in bright light
Reviews.Author: Blazing Tartan
Reviews.Content: The camera takes decent-enough photographs but in bright sunlight it's impossible to see what you're trying to take: The LCD display is useless.  I've never had a problem like this with all the other cameras I've had or have (4 other Panasonic and 4 Canon).  This was a gift for my wife and, outside when it's bright, she can only guess what's going to end up in the picture.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Sent it back
Reviews.Author: mountainmomma
Reviews.Content: This item arrived broken, so we sent it back. We were going to get a new one, but in the meantime, we found the lost camera we were trying to replace, so it all worked out for the best.

Reviews.Title: It's not charged by usb port!!!!
Reviews.Author: lucy
Reviews.Content: i didn't know this camera should be charged by the own battery charger.It's very uncomfortable. :(The only thing that i like is the size of this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Powerful 5x z OIS zoom
720p HD Video
2.7" LCD
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix FH6 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 5 Optical Zoom (Black)
